attributes.action: implement the recommendations of the Engineering and Technology Board for the UK engineering sector.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A new report by the Engineering and Technology Board calls for the government to provide a road map for the UK engineering sector such as tax breaks for companies, more engineers, and apprentices to best make use of a resurgence in manufacturing. Currently the UK is 6th in manufacturing but more needs to be done to ensure growth.
